input.sentences: my brother had a great idea to throw a pirate themed party .
he really got into the spirit .
his girlfriend played along | and brought her brother .
i was n't so into it | but my boyfriend was .
i got the tiara | and kept it even though it was a dig at my party pooper attitude . it was still a fun party .
output.sentences: They throw a themed pirate party.
He is definitely in the spirit.
They played with the pirate toys his girlfriend brought.
She took a picture with her boyfriend.
She wore the tiara because she is a party poopers.
